whyClientsChoose.name: Why Clients Choose Korn Ferry
whyClientsChoose.description: This analysis identifies key themes explaining why clients choose Korn Ferry, focusing on positive factors, competitive advantages, and selection criteria.

themes.label: Trusted Relationships and Continuity
themes.description: Clients value long-standing relationships with Korn Ferry consultants, which build trust and ensure continuity across engagements.

supportingQuotes.text: I tend to go to Korn Ferry because I actually like the people... they know me.
supportingQuotes.interviewId: Paul Lester, Hudson Advisors UK Ltd.

supportingQuotes.text: Anywhere Chris went, I would go.

interviewIds: Paul Lester, Hudson Advisors UK Ltd.
Dr. Jan Stefan Scheld, Boehringer Ingelheim

themes.label: High-Quality Candidate Pool
themes.description: Clients appreciate the quality and fit of candidates provided by Korn Ferry, often exceeding expectations.

supportingQuotes.text: They did a very good job of expanding and including some interesting people.
The candidate quality repeatedly exceeded expectations.

themes.label: Strong Market and Industry Knowledge
themes.description: Korn Ferry's deep understanding of specific industries and markets is a key differentiator for clients.

supportingQuotes.text: They knew our business, they knew the nuts and bolts of our business.
They know the business, they know our industry, they know what they're doing.

interviewIds: Dr. Jan Stefan Scheld, Boehringer Ingelheim

themes.label: Responsive and Proactive Communication
themes.description: Clients value Korn Ferry's responsiveness and proactive communication throughout the search process.

supportingQuotes.text: They were incredibly responsive.
supportingQuotes.interviewId: Gary Knell, San Diego Zoo Wildlife Alliance

supportingQuotes.text: We had one scheduled weekly call throughout the process... and they were always available for other queries.

interviewIds: Gary Knell, San Diego Zoo Wildlife Alliance
Dr. Jan Stefan Scheld, Boehringer Ingelheim

themes.label: Expertise in Assessment and Tools
themes.description: Korn Ferry's use of assessment tools and structured processes adds value to the search and selection process.

supportingQuotes.text: We use their psychometric tools for assessment, and they were very, very good.
They even brought in one of... a psychologist on their staff, and that was a useful session.
supportingQuotes.interviewId: Gary Knell, San Diego Zoo Wildlife Alliance

interviewIds: Gary Knell, San Diego Zoo Wildlife Alliance
Dr. Jan Stefan Scheld, Boehringer Ingelheim

promoterExperience.name: The Promoter Experience
promoterExperience.description: Themes that characterize what promoters value most about working with Korn Ferry, focusing on exceptional experiences and strong satisfaction.

themes.label: Trusted Long-term Relationships
themes.description: Promoters value the strong, trusted relationships built over time with Korn Ferry consultants, which foster confidence and loyalty.

supportingQuotes.text: I trust him with my business...Anywhere Chris went, I would go.
I knew the boss, I knew the consultant that I wanted to work with, because I have a deep trust in [Danny]'s... human touch.

themes.label: High-Quality Candidate Pools
themes.description: Promoters appreciate the high caliber and well-aligned candidate pools provided by Korn Ferry, which meet or exceed expectations.

supportingQuotes.text: They absolutely understood the brief, really fully targeted exactly the right people, put a great long list together.
In terms of the number of... the quality and the quantity of candidates, did they meet your expectations? â€“ Yes, absolutely.

themes.label: Responsive and Proactive Communication
themes.description: Promoters value Korn Ferry's consistent, proactive communication and responsiveness throughout the engagement process.

supportingQuotes.text: They were incredibly responsive.
We had one scheduled weekly call throughout the process... and they were always available for other queries, more ad hoc stuff.

themes.label: Expertise and Market Knowledge
themes.description: Promoters highlight Korn Ferry's deep expertise and understanding of their industry and market, which adds significant value to the search process.

supportingQuotes.text: They know the business, they know our industry, they know what they're doing.
She understands the healthcare business extremely well and she's really buttoned up on this.

themes.label: Collaborative and Flexible Approach
themes.description: Promoters value Korn Ferry's collaborative and flexible approach, which adapts to client needs and preferences.

supportingQuotes.text: Their proposal was very pragmatic and cost effective unlike some of the other [companies].
They were very client-oriented, very service-oriented, very reactive... I really felt like a client.

whereFallsShort.name: Where the Experience Falls Short
whereFallsShort.description: Identified themes where Korn Ferry's experience falls short based on client feedback.

themes.label: Inconsistent Candidate Quality
themes.description: Clients expressed dissatisfaction with the quality and suitability of candidates presented.

supportingQuotes.text: Some of the people on the shortlist had minimal experience... after five minutes, you knew they just were nowhere near what you wanted.
They didn't really generate the level of the candidates that we thought they should have.
We ended up getting quite junior people for a director-level role... [that wasn't] going to work for our organisation.

themes.label: Communication and Coordination Issues
themes.description: Clients reported breakdowns in communication and coordination, leading to confusion and inefficiencies.

supportingQuotes.text: We had a candidate who couldn't seem to connect... it was like phone tag and email tag.
The reports would often land an hour or two before the call... you have no hope in hell of getting to it.
Early on, it was a little confusing... several different people... reaching out... we couldn't search for [emails] easily.
They rely on us very heavily for everything logistical...It feels like they kind of expect us to do their logistics.

themes.label: Compensation and Offer Management
themes.description: Clients experienced challenges with obtaining and managing compensation information, affecting offer processes.

supportingQuotes.text: Trying to get out of them what current comp was, was impossible.
They should have known those candidates were not going to move.
They kept having to go back and forth... it took forever to put an offer together.

themes.label: Diversity and Inclusion Gaps
themes.description: Clients noted a lack of diversity in candidate slates and consulting teams, impacting perceptions and outcomes.

supportingQuotes.text: We had to remind the guys a number of times that we want to see women as well as men.
All the consultants from Korn Ferry were all men... it didn't really sit very well.

themes.label: Assessment and Tool Utilization
themes.description: Clients found limited value in assessment tools, questioning their relevance and impact.

supportingQuotes.text: I wasn't blown away, [and] I don't think our president was blown away by it.
We got that for free in some instances, but honestly, I didn't use it.
